title: When I open League this pops up
body:
Every time I open league it crashes right away and im not able to open the game. Instead this pops up.

file:///C:/Users/domin/Pictures/bugsplat.JPG

replies.body:
At least we know its a bugsplat :).

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

When did it start? Have you changed hardware or drivers recently?
